author: Marty Johnson
title: South African president extends lockdown two weeks, takes pay cut
description: South African President Cyril Ramaphosa on Friday extended South Africa's nationwide lockdown for another two weeks amid the COVID-19 pandemic.Ramaphosa initially announced the lockdown on March 23, with it going i...
content:
South African President Cyril Ramaphosa on Friday extended South Africa's nationwide lockdown for another two weeks amid the COVID-19 pandemic.
Ramaphosa initially announced the lockdown on March 23, with it going into effect March 26 and scheduled to end Ap… [+1216 chars]
